Tell the doctor if the examination 
is uncomfortable.
• Your breasts are unlikely to 
be examined unless you 
have a particular concern.
• A cervical smear test may 
be discussed if you have 
not had one in the past 
three years (see page 64). 
This is usually delayed until 
three months after delivery.
• If you are not immune to 
rubella (German measles) 
and	received	your	first	
immunisation before you left 
hospital,	you	will	be	offered	
your second one now. If you
